name: SupportFranzAndGilliam
_source: speak;Franz;Say, Sir Gilliam, can I ask you a question?
speak;Franz;Are you disturbed about fighting with me?
speak;Gilliam;Why would you say something like that?
speak;Franz;You and I are from different lands.|We have different backgrounds...|I thought that might've made you feel uncomfortable.
speak;Gilliam;Blast.|I don't need to answer that.

speak;Gilliam;Listen.|I'm here by my king's order, and by his order alone.|I'm well aware that we have diverse backgrounds and experiences.|I don't care who I pair up with.|You can't always have your own way.|That's just how it works in Frelia.|It's luck of the draw, you follow?|Do they let you swap partners until you find that special someone back in Renais?
speak;Franz;Oh, no!|No, no, no...|That's not what I meant.|It's just... I was worried that I might be slowing you down with my lesser skills.
speak;Gilliam;Franz, you're wasting your time worrying when there are better things to be done.
speak;Gilliam;Like training, of course.|Quit your worrying and show me how good a Knight of Renais can be.
speak;Franz;I could ask for nothing better.|Please!
speak;Gilliam;Franz, I can see your training has paid off.
speak;Franz;Yes, and I have to say, I'm surprised.|I feel the energy flowing through me.|I think it's because of my resistance training, actually.
speak;Gilliam;Frelia's resistance training, you mean.|You mean to tell me that you have no training like that in Renais?
speak;Franz;We do have a system to strengthen our chest, arms, shoulders, and legs.|However, that's where we stop.|We don't train each individual finger...
speak;Gilliam;Every muscle acts in relation to each other muscle.|How can you neglect the fingers?|That's how we Frelians think.
speak;Franz;Fascinating how our countries can have such distinct training systems, isn't it?
speak;Gilliam;And you've been training with our system every day without a single complaint!|I'm impressed.
speak;Franz;Oh, that's because, each night before I go to sleep...|I do our traditional relaxation exercises.
speak;Franz;Before going to bed, flex each muscle you used, and you'll wake up feeling refreshed.
speak;Gilliam;What, no fatigue the following day?
speak;Franz;I can teach you if you like.
speak;Gilliam;Well, Franz, it looks like there's a lot I can learn from Renais.
speak;Franz;Why the change of heart, Sir Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;I've been doing your exercises every night, and I feel fantastic.
speak;Gilliam;I appreciate Renais much more, thanks to you.
speak;Franz;Really?|I'm glad.|I'm thrilled that the great Sir Gilliam approves of the training in Renais.

speak;Franz;No, honestly!|I am thrilled.|It's a small thing, I know...|But when someone recognizes the fine qualities of Renais, I get a thrill.|Renais is a small country, but it contains much that is good.
speak;Gilliam;I don't know Renais, but I do know how you feel as a fellow knight.|The more we are away, the more we think back on our beloved homeland.
speak;Franz;I'm glad that I'm not alone in this.
speak;Gilliam;Chin up, lad.|Be proud of your country, Franz, Knight of Renais.|As your friend from neighboring Frelia, I'm glad you're proud of your home.
speak;Franz;Yes, Sir Gilliam!|Thank you very much!
